TopicTitle: Bad gateway on some pages on kerbalspaceprogram.com

Articles.Content:
Is there something strange about the kerbalspaceprogram.com web site?

I was trying to install a full version from on my main pc here so I followed the links from the demo version only to get a bad gateway error. If I go to the web site some pages work;

but other pages on the same web site return a 502 / gateway error

Is this something at my end, their end or some weird page specific routing issue?

Edit to add - it seems to be the support and store pages, which I suppose could live on another server somewhere.

 

Edited February 19, 2019 by jnbspace
And yes, there is something strange about the site right now. They're working to pinpoint and fix the cause.
